query:
SELECT
                s.id,
                s.name,
                s.created_at,
                s.created_by_id,
                s.covers,
                s.banners,
                s.tags,
                COALESCE(tg_count.cnt, 0) AS title_groups_amount
            FROM series s
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT series_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt
                FROM title_groups
                WHERE series_id IS NOT NULL
                GROUP BY series_id
            ) tg_count ON tg_count.series_id = s.id
            WHERE (s.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%')
            ORDER BY s.created_at DESC
            OFFSET $2
            LIMIT $3
